Dm_ZO_0023_Text_007_b:
<sp:3:0:2:0601>But you saw it, too, did you not? Using
that mechanism did have an effect!
Dm_ZO_0023_Text_000_c:
This is the source of the pure waters
of Zora's Domain.
Dm_ZO_0023_Text_001_b:
Use your power to turn on the four
faucets, and you can collect water here.
Dm_ZO_0023_Text_003_b:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseM_00>It happened yet again! Only this time,
I heard the voice loud and clear!

<sp:3:0:2:0701>The four faucets... I see! If we turn
those on, we can acquire more water
for the water vessels!
Dm_ZO_0023_Text_003_c:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:ShidoAizuchi_01>Right! Let us get to work, Link. Together!<sp:5:0:0>
With our powers combined, there is
nothing in this world that can stop us!
